description: External tools required for the binary-released checkpoint phase (Node.js compilation)

python3.description: Python 3 interpreter (required for Node.js build system)

gcc-13.description: GCC 13 C compiler (required for Node.js v24+ on Ubuntu 22.04)
gcc-13.notes: Node.js v24+ requires GCC 12+ for ada URL parser C++20 constexpr support. Ubuntu 22.04 ships with GCC 11.

g++-13.description: GCC 13 C++ compiler (required for Node.js v24+ on Ubuntu 22.04)
g++-13.notes: Node.js v24+ requires GCC 12+ for ada URL parser C++20 constexpr support. Ubuntu 22.04 ships with GCC 11.

make.description: GNU Make build tool (required for Node.js build)

xcode.description: Apple Xcode development environment with Command Line Tools (macOS only)
xcode.notes: Xcode must be installed manually. Version requirements: macOS 14 requires Xcode 16.1+, macOS 15 requires Xcode 16.4+
